text:
[Verse]
Raindrops fall sky gray
Jumpin' in puddles play
Laugh loud shadows fade
Together we parade

[Verse 2]
Lightning fills the night
Feet move rhythm light
Hearts beat - sparks ignite
In this rain delight

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the joy not the pain
Round and round again
With you I am sane

[Verse 3]
Moon's our disco ball
Endless fun we call
Hand in hand we fall
Echoes through it all

[Bridge]
Splashin' dreams away
Lost but it's okay
Night to endless day
In the rain we sway

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the joy not the pain
Round and round again
With you I am sane
title: Dancing in the Rain
